channel.title: CVE Feed for HMS Networks -- EWON FLEXY 202
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HMS Networks -- EWON FLEXY 202

item.title: CVE-2024-7755|2024-10-17T18:13:52.552Z -- hms%20networks -- ewon%20flexy%20202
item.description: The EWON FLEXY 202 transmits credentials using a weak encoding method base64. An attacker who is present in the network can sniff the traffic and decode the credentials.
